author: bayard
msg: The dist-build task needs to leave a jar file behind so it can be put into the Maven repository

author: mrdon
msg: Modified the process of getting the configuration so that it would only look for unmodified
files once per request, and not for static resources.  The problem arose when I modified
the ActionMapper to take into consideration when determining the action mapping (allows
action names with slashes).  The Configuration was being checked before it determined if
the request was for a static file or not.

author: jacopoc
msg: Implemented a new service that, when atp goes under minimum stock, creates a requirement for the reorder qty.
So now we have three different requirement services that look at inventory levels:
STOCK_QOH: when qoh goes under minimum stock a requirement is created for the reorder qty
STOCK_ATP (new): when atp goes under minimum stock a requirement is created for the reorder qty
ATP (was STOCK_ATP): creates a requirement on ATP levels and links it to the order item that caused the reservations
